About Me

Hi, my name’s Kiran and I’m a senior software engineer. As well as design and develpment of embedded application development I also have experience in board bringup, machine learning and performance optimization. I have worked with different teams gaining teamwork and leadership skills.

I am most skilled in: Linux Internals, Networking and Food Diet

Projects

QC – QDN Home Control Application

developer.qualcomm.com/project/home-control-qca402x

Implemented Home controlled IOT application using BLE

Development of Home control application on QCA4020. Created a Home Automation service with characteristics that control end devices. Implemented persistence storage and fast connect procedure on QCA4020 by applying power optimization techniques.

Building image OpenQ 212A Home hub

Customizing the Embedded images with Yocto-BSP for IoT applications

Building the image for IOT Applications and verifying the image readiness for the official release by building the Kernel Modules. Executing the test cases using python automation.

Tizen Performance and Optimization

Improving the launch performance of the native applications in Tizen

Implemented the idea of Light Weight Process for Application Launch Optimisation. Memory leak & Memory Consumption analysis using valgrind, massif visualizer and dlogs.

Qualcomm QC – DashCam

developer.qualcomm.com/project/image-segmentation-using-deeplabv3

Implemented a Machine learning application for object detection for Robot and to decide it's movement which can run on Snapdragon platforms.

Created a CNN and DeeplabV3 Segmentation model on Tensorflow Framework. Used NPE SDK to convert the machine learning model for Snapdragon platform compatibility. Improving the model perfomance by analysing the models using the SNPE Benchmarking Tools.

Amazon VA Skill Development on OpenWRT

Bringup of IPQ4019 board with OpenWRT and integrating Alexa on it

Cross Compiling OpenWRT (Customed Linux) for IPQ4019 and integrating AWS SDK as a module in the OpenWRT. Involved in design and development of Alexa skill named Lancy, provides the status of the EC2 servers.

Implementation of I2C Device Driver

Implementation of I2C driver for RTC DS-1307

Involved in Designing, Development and Testing of I2C client drivers. Understanding the Datasheet for GPIO communication on RaspberryPi 3B+.

DNS Implementation

Implemented the iDNS client and server programming

Gathering requirements from RFC 1035 also Involved in design and development of back-end part of the application. Created the database using hash technique to store the cache memory for IP-mapping.
